channel.title: Changing hp of a npc (562)
channel.description: How to change a npcs hp on a 562 [dementhium] I can't find were to change it.. :confused:

item.title: Changing hp of a npc (562)
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Do what I said before in that new folder, then in the .txt file, put this in it:

@echo off cd ../NDE title Starting Npc Definitions Editor (NDE)! java -jar dist/NDE.jar title Npc Definitions Editor pause

Now press ‘File’ and ‘Save as…’ and save it as whatever.bat - Change whatever to whatever you want. Make sure you have the .bat at the end though otherwise it won’t work… Now close that file and run the batch file. It should open some sort of a NPC definition editor…

Read full topic
